dc:title: Notes
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Praises the Catholic Arts Quartrly edited by Ade Bethune and says it portrays Peter Maurin's synthesis of Cult, Culture, and Cultivation. Urges readers to buy her books.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 491 1948-10-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
